content: {"Name": "Van Rensselaer Heights", "Entity_Id": 367, "Category": "Mobile Food Resources", "Subcategory": "Veggie Mobile\u00ae", "Organization": "Capital Roots", "More_Information": "We recommend calling to verify times and locations\r\nCall or email at least one day ahead to place your order.\r\nEmail: mobilemarket@capitalroots.org", "Counties": ["Rensselaer"], "Location": "", "Address": "460 Forbes Avenue", "City": "Rensselaer", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12144", "Phone": "518-274-8685", "Hours_of_Operation": "Thursday 10:15am-11:00am", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "Cash, EBT/SNAP & FMNP, Double Up Food Bucks, Fresh Connect Checks, Cash, Credit, Debit", "Website": "https://www.capitalroots.org/veggie-mobile/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 1, "Latitude": "42.659242", "Longitude": "-73.728792", "Last_Updated": "06-10-2025", "icon": "marker-795548", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
